C-Deck ERP

Streamline your operations with a CRM that just works.

C-DECK ERP

Streamline your operations with
complete control

01

C-Deck ERP is your all-in-one solution for business management. From project tracking to resource allocation, our platform gives you the tools to optimize workflows, enhance team collaboration, and drive business growth.

What Makes Us Different

Everything you need to run your business without the headache. Built for people who have better things to do.

Executive Dashboard

Get a bird's-eye view of your entire construction business. Track ongoing projects, monitor financials, view expense distribution, and stay on top of workforce attendance—all from one powerful dashboard.

Project Status Overview
Financial Analytics
Expense Distribution Charts
Attendance Tracking

Comprehensive Reporting

From sales and payments to progress tracking and inventory—access every report you need in one place. Generate detailed insights across departments without switching between multiple tools.

Sales & Payment Reports
Progress & Task Tracking
Purchase & Expense Analysis

Project Management

Manage all your construction projects with ease. Track progress percentages, monitor project status, handle pending approvals, and access material requests—everything organized in one intuitive interface.

Real-time Progress Tracking
Project Status Management
Pending Approvals Dashboard
Client & Project Overview

Asset & Material Management

Keep your warehouse and materials organized effortlessly. Track cement, sand, bricks, plumbing supplies, and more with detailed category, unit, and location information for complete inventory control.

Warehouse Inventory
Material Categorization
Stock Level Tracking
Quick Add & Edit

Finance & Party Management

Stay on top of your finances with real-time visibility into advances, payments due, receivables, and vendor settlements. Manage all your parties, suppliers, and clients from a single finance hub.

Advance & Payment Tracking
Vendor Settlement Status
Party Balance Management
Real-time Financial Overview
